GlobalParameter.name: cpc_LowestTopTrqGear
GlobalParameter.description: lowest gear to which TopTorque is applied

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_cac_br_trq_ebs_x_rpm
LocalParameter.description: engine brake: rpm

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_cac_br_trq_ebs1_min_2m
LocalParameter.description: engine brake: level 1 min torque

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_cac_br_trq_ebs2_min_2m
LocalParameter.description: engine brake: level 2 min torque

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_cac_br_trq_ebs3_min_2m
LocalParameter.description: engine brake: level 3 min torque

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_ebm_ebs1_temp_speed_cond_off_2m
LocalParameter.description: Lower switch off engine oil temperature [°C] of engine brake step 1

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_ebm_ebs1_temp_speed_cond_on_2m
LocalParameter.description: Lower switch on engine oil temperature [°C] of engine brake step 1

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_ebm_ebs1_temp_speed_cond_x_speed
LocalParameter.description: Lower switch engine speed [rpm] of engine brake step 1

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_ebm_ebs2_temp_speed_cond_off_2m
LocalParameter.description: Lower switch off engine oil temperature [°C] of engine brake step 2

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_ebm_ebs2_temp_speed_cond_on_2m
LocalParameter.description: Lower switch on engine oil temperature [°C] of engine brake step 2

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_ebm_ebs2_temp_speed_cond_x_speed
LocalParameter.description: Lower switch engine speed [rpm] of engine brake step 2

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_epf_ebm_overspeed_1m
LocalParameter.description: Maximum permitted engine speed during engine brake mode before mechanical destruction of engine

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_epf_warn_overspeed_1m
LocalParameter.description: Max speed for buzzer request

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_idleSpeed_rpm
LocalParameter.description: mcm_idleSpeed_rpm, mcm desired idle speed under standard operation

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_sys_get_eng_brk_performance
LocalParameter.description: Engine brake performance variant (0: standard engine brake, 1: high performance engine brake)

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_osg_eng_speed_max_ext_1m
LocalParameter.description: Max. type 0 speed controller velocity

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_osg_trq_red_fac_2m
LocalParameter.description: Torque reduction factor vector

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_osg_trq_red_fac_x_over_speed
LocalParameter.description: Torque reduction speed vector

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_sys_can_engine_char_1m
LocalParameter.description: Engine Emission Class (Euro 4, 5, 6, …)

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_sys_can_performance_class_1m
LocalParameter.description: Nominal engine power

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_sys_can_trq_inertia_1m
LocalParameter.description: Engine inertia (includes flywheel)

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_sys_cylinder_value_1m
LocalParameter.description: Number of engine cylinders

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_sys_motor_type_1m
LocalParameter.description: Engine type (e.g. 471)

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_tbf_trq_max_r0_2m
LocalParameter.description: Vector of engine map full-load torque values, highestTorqueCurve for TopTorque and noTopTorque engines

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_tbf_trq_max_r0_x_eng_speed
LocalParameter.description: Breakpoint vector of engine map velocity values (full-load torque values)

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_tbf_trq_max_r1_2m
LocalParameter.description: Vector of engine map full-load torque values | lower/2nd TorqueCurve for TopTorque engines

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_tbf_trq_max_r1_x_eng_speed
LocalParameter.description: Breakpoint vector of engine map velocity values (full-load torque values)

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_tfc_fm_tm_x_eng_speed
LocalParameter.description: Breakpoint vector of engine map velocity values (specific Fuel consumption)

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_tfc_fm_tm_y_trq
LocalParameter.description: Breakpoint vector of engine map torque values

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_tfc_fm_tmh_3m
LocalParameter.description: Matrix of engine specific fuel consumption

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_tic_trq_loss_fric_3m
LocalParameter.description: Engine friction torque map

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_tic_trq_loss_fric_x_eng_speed
LocalParameter.description: Engine friction torque map speed sampling points

LocalParameter.name: dep.mcm_tic_trq_loss_fric_y_t_eng_oil
LocalParameter.description: Engine friction torque map temperature sampling points

LocalParameter.name: dep.axle_config
LocalParameter.description: (1): number of all wheels (2): number of driven wheels

LocalParameter.name: dep.wheel_f_R
LocalParameter.description: fRollCoeff over all axes

LocalParameter.name: dep.axle_iDiff
LocalParameter.description: Axle ratio

LocalParameter.name: dep.ret_i
LocalParameter.description: retarder ratio

LocalParameter.name: dep.veh_m_kg
LocalParameter.description: Vehicle and trailer mass

LocalParameter.name: dep.wheel_r_d
LocalParameter.description: Dynamic wheel radius

LocalParameter.name: dep.rcm_x_ret_GW_rpm
LocalParameter.description: Breakpoint vector of retarder velocity values

LocalParameter.name: dep.rcm_y_ret_M_max
LocalParameter.description: Vector of retarder full-load torque values

LocalParameter.name: dep.tx_iTxAllBw
LocalParameter.description: Ratio of reverse gears

LocalParameter.name: dep.tx_iTxAllFw
LocalParameter.description: Ratio of forward gears

LocalParameter.name: dep.rcm_x_ret_GW_rpm
LocalParameter.description: Breakpoint vector of retarder velocity values for automatic transmissions voith or zf

LocalParameter.name: dep.rcm_y_ret_M_max
LocalParameter.description: Vector of retarder full-load torque values for automatic transmissions voith or zf
